actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-858.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 215 - 170 (Record Vote No: 325).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5142) to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish grant programs, and confidentiality protections, relating to counseling and testing with respect to acquired immune deficiency syndrome, to amend such Act with respect to research programs relating to such syndrome, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5142 (acquired immune deficiency syndrome programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5142) to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish grant programs, and confidentiality protections, relating to counseling and testing with respect to acquired immune deficiency syndrome, to amend such Act with respect to research programs relating to such syndrome, and for other purposes.
